ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Put your trust in the Almighty, the Most Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have trust in the Mighty, the Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And put your trust in Him Who is Immensely Mighty, Most Compassionate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have trust in the Majestic and All-merciful God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And rely upon (Allah) the Almighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And put your trust in the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And rely on the Mighty, the Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Put thy trust in the All-mighty, the All-compassionate
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And put thy trust in the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Put your trust in the Mighty One, the Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And rely thou upon the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And put your trust in the All-mighty, the All-merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And put thy trust on the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And put your trust in the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Put your trust in the Almighty, the Most Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And put your trust in the Almighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:217] And put your trust (wa-tawakkal, or read fa-tawakkal, ‘then put your trust’) in the Mighty, the Merciful, God, in other words, entrust Him with all your affairs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And put thy trust in the Mighty) in His retribution against His enemies, (the Merciful) towards you and all believers.
